text: You just have to have a constant flow of articles.
:thinking_face: there shouldn't be Joni, but if you can DM me a few examples I can take a look at them with my team and see what might be happening

really dumb question, if I remember correctly there used to be an easy way to get to a "edit CTA" page or modal or something based on the GUID of that CTA, but I can't figure it out for the life of me. I can get to the details page by pasting in the guid in the URL, but I'm not finding a way to edit the CTA from there. Was this removed, or am I missing something?
So is there a way to have the author pinged when a comment is added to their blog?
can we no longer edit the alt text for the logo in content settings? or am i not seeing where to make this edit?
this would be nice! I'd love personally to be notified when my blog posts are commented on. but i don't want to get notified for all the other posts. If there is a way would love to know
